message: Let's start fair, Bob. We both get an equal share of the money.
I'll take a bit more, since you lose value each round
I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair share. Let's split the difference from your last offer.
You're losing value, I'm not. I'll take a bit more this time
I'm willing to accept your previous offer, Bob.  I understand the inflation is impacting me more, and I want to avoid further losses.
